S.FORM: Kesun ta "Bnrahan Snlmean" (Kari Amerika: Linguistic reconstruction) we, spooda ta "Ooda psseung" mbarah smmalu kari uxe de kari pusu na krkari so uka pntasan cbeyo. Pngerah we, pnstiyu daha kari wada bnrahan smmalu. Ooda mbarah smmalu Ooda mbarah smmalu psseung krkari lutuc we, kesun daha "Bnrahan snlmean pnsseengan" (Kari Amerika: Comparitive reconstruction), ncugil kesun daha "Bnrahan snlmean nganguc" (Kari Amerika: External reconstruction). Quri hnyegan ini pntena ga meniq truma kingal kari we, kesun daha "Bnrahan snlmean truma" (Kari Amerika: Internal reconstruction). Patis pnyahan Marius JÃ¸hndal(2016) Li11 Historical Linguistics: The comparative method , 23 January 2016, Linguistics at Cambridge. Anthony Fox, Linguistic Reconstruction: An Introduction to Theory and Method (Oxford University Press, 1995) . Henry M. Hoenigswald, Language Change and Linguistic Reconstruction (University of Chicago Press, 1960) .
